version_description:
- The new speedometer shows the data throughput up to 100 Mbit/s. Enjoy 4G - LTE ,-)
- The IP address query is up and running again
- We fixed a bug in the data usage view

- Fixed memory usage view for iPhone 5s.
- Performance optimizations.

- Today Extension (Widget) showing your current data usage, and the down- and uplink speed (iOS 8 only)
- Performance improvements and bug fixes. Thanks for your feedback!

- New export functionality allows you to share your daily data usage statistics and your speedtest history using the built-in Apple sharing (AirDrop, iMessage, Mail and many more...). Just select ‘Export Your Data’ in the ‘Settings’ tab.

- Optimised for iPhone 5, 5s, 6 and 6 Plus Screen

- Today Extension (Widget) showing your current data usage, and the down- and uplink speed (iOS 8 only) with minor stability fixes.

- Performance improvements and bug fixes. Thanks for your feedback!

- Apple Watch Support - You can now access your current data usage and the type of data connection (wifi, mobile) using your Apple Watch via Glance Screen or App. Furthermore, we've added some additional features, e.g., current battery level of your phone, capacity of your phone, ...

- Second Widget shows data connection information in real-time - A second compact widget now shows you the type of data connection (wifi, mobile) and current uplink and downlink data speed.

- Reintroduced Notifications for iOS 8 - A notification is send if your data usage is getting to high. For this feature, you can setup your data usage according to your data plan.

- Small changes:
- Export functionality of your speedtest and data usage was corrected and improved.
- Widget experienced some small changes to ensure accurate reporting of the data usage.

- Performance improvements and bug fixes. Thanks for your feedback!

We spend some time on improving the performance and the stability of the Traffic Monitor app - including the WatchOS App, the Widget, and the main App - for iOS 9.

Thanks for your valuable feedback!

Stability andpPerformance improvements as well as
- Watch App is back for all devices with > iOS 8.2, and
- Double-tap the Widgets to open the App.

Stability and performance improvements as well as
- improvements of the data usage notifications for mobile traffic,
- native watchOS 2 support, and
- further improvements of the speed test.
Performance and Stability improvements.
Fixes issues with the Today Extension (Widget) in the Notification Center. Thank you for your feedback!
We improved the stability and the performance of our app based on your feedback. Thank you!

Our latest release allows you to automatically track your data usage on a map, even when you are not actively using Traffic Monitor.
You can activate and deactivate the background location feature at any time on the app's settings page.

You may recognize a permanent navigation needle in your status bar when the background location is enabled. Please note that the GPS is not permanently on in that case. Your iPhone just informs the Traffic Monitor application when your location has changed significantly (e.g. during your way to the office). This enables the Traffic Monitor to update your data usage automatically also when you are not actively using the app.

Enjoy the new Traffic Monitor!

Our latest release allows you to automatically track your data usage on a map, even when you are not actively using Traffic Monitor.
You can activate and deactivate the background location feature at any time on the app's settings page.

You may recognize a permanent navigation needle in your status bar when the background location is enabled. Please note that the GPS is not permanently on in that case. Your iPhone just informs the Traffic Monitor application when your location has changed significantly (e.g. during your way to the office). This enables the Traffic Monitor to update your data usage automatically also when you are not actively using the app.

Moreover, we again improved data usage and speed test accuracy.

Enjoy the new Traffic Monitor!
